title: MeasureText in samples seems not to work with zoom on Android emulator
body:
https://us.v-cdn.net/5019960/uploads/editor/3j/tsd7ktfjdfdc.png
https://us.v-cdn.net/5019960/uploads/editor/og/d8et3k89rfl6.png

All I did was edit the MeasureTextSample.cs to add 

public const string TEXT = "This is a longer text string to measure Skia (UTF-8)";

and set the various text strings to TEXT rather than "Skia (UTF-8)";

I then ran the project and did used the emulator in  zoom in / out function.   I am using Visual Studio 17.  I used VisualStudio_android-23_x86_tablet (Android 6.0 - API 23)

I haven't tested this on a device as I do not have one.

Is this expected?
